text: in this video you'll see how to manage
resource usage with aws service catalog
with this service you can control which
resources are accessible to end users
reduce unnecessary costs
and track resource usage over time let's

cloud or amazon ec2 instance
for a computing task

navigate to the ec2 console and

this might cause them to select an

in this case let's select an extra large
instance type
now we'll complete the process of

this instance without any issues
we had complete freedom to decide what

if all your users have this level of

in addition to managing resource usage

you can create specific budgets for your

and receive alerts when costs or usage

first we'll associate the budget with a
tag
for this example we'll create a single

so that all usage is linked to the same

you can create more granular budgets
associated with different cost centers
in your organization

you can choose a fixed monthly budget

amount per month
in this case let's create a fixed budget

now let's configure an alert for this

in this case we'll choose an alert
threshold of 80 percent
